[ Test 1: Type Conversion ]
    INT   00000000_00000000_00000000_00001111 is converted into TFP   010_00001011_10000000
    FLOAT 11000000_00010000_00000000_00000000 is converted into TFP   110_00000000_10000000
    TFP   010_00001011_10000000 is converted into INT   00000000_00000000_00000000_00001111
    TFP   110_00000000_10000000 is converted into FLOAT 11000000_00010000_00000000_00000000

[ Test 2: Addition ]
    010_00001011_10000000 + 110_00000000_10000000 = 010_00001010_01100000

[ Test 3: Multiplication ]
    010_00001011_10000000 * 110_00000000_10000000 = 110_00010000_00111000
